channel.title: Comments on: The New Order Reunion Is a Joke without Peter Hook

item.title: By: RacecaR
item.dc:creator: RacecaR
item.description: New Order is a great band, it is very sad that they are bickering and not making music together, I hope they put aside their differences and make great music again.
item.content:encoded: New Order is a great band, it is very sad that they are bickering and not making music together, I hope they put aside their differences and make great music again.
